text: William Henry "David" Fonseca (1 May 1954 - 30 April 2015) was a Belizean politician and businessman. He served as the Mayor of Belize City from 1 March 1999 until 1 March 2006. He was a member of the People's United Party. Fonseca died on 30 April 2015 in Belize City, aged 60. He committed suicide (killed himself) by shooting himself in the head. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Belizean politicians Category:Business people Category:Mayors Category:Politicians who committed suicide Category:Suicides by firearm
title: David Fonseca (politician)
